title: Logan Paul shows off gruesome boxing injury ahead of KSI rematch
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Logan Paul has been busy gearing up for the highly-anticipated boxing rematch against KSI – and he’s not afraid to share his injuries.

This is your gross photo alert – don’t say we didn’t warn you.

The YouTuber took to Instagram to share the gruesome injury, explaining: ‘I got a little piece of my gum torn off today.’

Zooming in for all to see, he added: ‘You see that? Right there. And then I swallowed it, chewed it up, and used it as protein.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Lovely.

Logan’s injury comes after the official fight trailer dropped on KSI’s YouTube channel – and the drama has officially been taken up a notch.

Logan, nicknamed The Maverick, is heard to say: ‘I feel like a f***ing animal… the person you see standing in front of you right now, you will not see this person in two months. This is a second chance.’

He kindly zoomed in so everyone could see (Picture: Instagram/loganpaul)

‘I know I train more intense than he does, I’m a better boxer,’ KSI, who’s taken on the nickname The Nightmare, says. ‘I’m a better fighter, I have more heart. He’s going to get knocked out.’

As scenes of the pair’s first boxing match, which ended in a majority draw, played out, KSI added: ‘I’m going to make him suffer.’

‘I’m not gonna go to war without my weapons, and to get those weapons takes years of training, dedication, passion,’ Logan said. ‘I don’t think the average creator can do that.’

The pair are taking to the ring in November (Picture: Getty Images)

KSI has been showing off his skills as he trained with heavyweight champ Anthony Joshua, while Logan gave fans a glimpse into his training regime at his workout showcase.

Meanwhile, the American star has high expectations for the winner of the match, claiming they’re set to be crowned the ‘YouTube King’.

It might take more than a boxing match to do that, but at least he’s aiming high.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘There’s so much on the line between me and KSI. There is so much on the line. Egos, subscribers, the crown of “The YouTube King”,’ he said.

‘The last match was a draw. If the W is secured in a monumental way, something similar to when Conor McGregor knocked out Jose Aldo, if something like that happens, it is going to be long-lasting form of stardom.’

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: Logan Paul shows off gruesome boxing injury ahead of KSI rematch at Staples Center in November.
